name: ding
content:
ding verb
(MAKE SOUND)
Add to word list
Add to word list
[ I ] to make a short ringing sound like a bell

ding verb
(HIT)
[ T ] US to damage the surface of something slightly by hitting it: She was worried she might ding the car beside her when she parked.

ding verb
(CRITICIZE)
[ T ] US informal to speak angrily to or criticize someone: Auditors dinged the agency for some of its practices.
ding noun [C]
(SOUND)
a short ringing sound like that made by a bell

ding noun [C]
(DAMAGE)
US a small damaged area on a surface where something has hit it: She had the ding in the paintwork repaired.
